entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Killarney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:19 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets near midnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to rain showers in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Windy. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 3. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. High 6. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
